content.prompt: The passage is most likely excerpted from which of the following?

choices.label: A Lakota folk tale that encourages youth to emulate an important elder
A cultural analysis that reveals the mythology of Lakota warrior society
A Lakota author’s account of his ancestral culture’s history and values
An instructional guide that teaches readers the Lakota path to humility

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
